about: I'm a Software Engineer with a great appreciation for technology and its possibilities. My focus areas are web programming, backend development, and data solutions. I believe in creating robust, scalable applications that solve real problems.

Together with a college colleague, I founded Digital Tasks, a freelance group specializing in digital services. Our first major project was Construtora Sematon, a comprehensive website that demonstrated our commitment to quality and client satisfaction.

That was my beginning, after some freelance work that gave me a lot of knowledge, I am currently working as a Software Engineering Analyst at Accenture, the largest global digital services consulting firm.
